frozen_definition.name: CreativePulse
frozen_definition.signal_source: Creative analysis: 'when creatives burn out unnoticed, you're paying for tired, ineffective output' and momentum tracking issues
frozen_definition.description: Simple creative energy tracker that helps artists and creators identify their productive patterns without project complexity
frozen_definition.target_user: Independent creatives who struggle with inconsistent output and want to understand their creative energy patterns
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Studies show creative teams experience 'peaks and valleys' that 'signal scattered priorities or running on adrenaline'
core_loop: Get insights about optimal creative times
frozen_definition.differentiation: Focus on creative energy patterns vs. project management, personal insight over team coordination
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes detailed pattern analysis, goal setting, and creative habit recommendations

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic tracking, premium for detailed analytics and personalized insights
